entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.0°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this afternoon then light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
